response.original_title: Bay City Rollers: Live at Barrowland
response.overview: In September 2015 the Bay City Rollers - Les McKeown, Alan Longmuir and Stuart ‘Woody’ Wood - announced to the world and ecstatic Bay City Roller fans that they were back! A UK tour was announced and the first of these shows after so many years away had to be at the iconic home of Scottish Rock’n’Roll... the Barrowland Ballroom in Glasgow.  One show was released…it sold out in 3 minutes. A further 3 shows announced...all sold out in 9 minutes…a Barrowland record! The stage was set for a momentous Tartan Rollermania Reunion.  We captured the magic on film... the excitement, the atmosphere and the sheer joy of the thousands of fans who had waited so many years to finally see their  idols
response.title: Bay City Rollers: Live at Barrowland
